Texts.Chs: ……在那里找到Callishk-Nyarrath的迁徙模式，他们会给其他人带来厄运。因此，他们被驱逐到黑暗之外，永远徘徊在空间之中，直到一位有足够力量的仲裁者拥有开锁之能，这些锁控制着构成他们质的移动空间。
Texts.Eng: ...and therein find the migration patterns of Callishk-Nyarrath and bring upon them the doom that they wrought on others. And so it was that They were cast out into the black beyond cursed forever to wander the spaces between until an arbiter of sufficient strength is capable of casting off the locks that hold the shifting spaces that form the mass of Them.

Texts.Chs: <超过200页的这样的咆哮......对你而言它没有任何意义。>
Texts.Eng: <over 200 pages of ranting like this...none of which makes any sense to you.>

Texts.Chs: 一本失传很久的知识书。
